name: MKDirectionsTransportType
desc: Constants that specify the type of conveyance to be used.

items.name: static var automobile: MKDirectionsTransportType
items.desc: Directions suitable for use while driving.

items.name: static var any: MKDirectionsTransportType
items.desc: Directions suitable for any transportation option.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a direction transport type using a raw unsigned integer value.
